::DeathScythe::

DeathScythe walks about a dozen feet away from Zyber, laughing as he 
looks back. Aiming his gun carefully, he fires two more shots, 
sealing the two other entrances to the cavern.

"I hope you enjoy the time you have to spend in this cavern. It will 
be your last hours."

He turns around and blasts the wall of rock that had covered the 
entrance, a few more rocks falling from the explosion, but the 
barrier giving through. DeathScythe walks out, firing behind himself 
to seal the cave.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> * Zyber raises her head a bit, and tries to rais herself to her 
feet but it 
> was useless.
> She almost seemed to quiver as DeathScythe walked up to her, 
knowing that 
> this was probably her final hour. She really didn't want to die, 
but she 
> couldn't move no matter how she tried.
> Zyber closed her optics, at least she wouldn't see him pull the 
trigger.
> 
> She was about ready to hear the click of the trigger when she 
suddenly head 
> DeathScythe laugh, and him speak words she least expected.
> He was going to let her live?
> Had he seen the true light after all, that killing other bots just 
because 
> he thought they were weak?
> 
> Zyber grunted as DeathScythe kicked her, actually doubling over and 
curling 
> around here stomach where his foot contacted with.
> She guessed not!
> She opens her optics a bit to see him turn and walk off, simply 
laying there 
> and trying to stand the pain.*
